Title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure (Anime)
text: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure (or JJBA for short) (Japanese: "ジョジョの奇妙な冒険") is an animated series which follows the story of the Joestar Bloodline coming face-to-face with all sorts of evil and having an grand adventure. It has aired in 2012 and as of November, 2020, there are 5 Parts/Seasons released with the latest edition being "Vento aureo", also known as "Golden Wind". It is based on Hirohiko Araki's Manga with the same name and follows the story very closely.
